Creates a new `_$variable_` whose value is looked up by the `_key_` in the key-value database. Matching rules are defined by the [`type`](#keyval_type) parameter of the [`keyval_zone`](#keyval_zone) directive. The database is stored in a shared memory zone specified by the `zone` parameter.

Creates a new $variable whose value is looked up by the key in the key-value database. Matching rules are defined by the type parameter of the keyval_zone directive. The database is stored in a shared memory zone specified by the zone parameter.
Sets the `_name_` and `_size_` of the shared memory zone that keeps the key-value database. Key-value pairs are managed by the [API](../http/ngx_http_api_module.html#stream_keyvals_).
Sets the name and size of the shared memory zone that keeps the key-value database. Key-value pairs are managed by the API.
